scripts.generate: npx prisma generate --schema ./prisma-auth-database/schema.prisma && npx prisma generate --schema ./prisma-bills-database/schema.prisma
scripts.reset: npx prisma migrate reset --force --skip-seed --schema ./prisma-auth-database/schema.prisma && npx prisma migrate reset --force --skip-seed --schema ./prisma-bills-database/schema.prisma
scripts.migrate: npx prisma migrate dev --schema ./prisma-auth-database/schema.prisma && npx prisma migrate dev --schema ./prisma-bills-database/schema.prisma
scripts.deploy: npx prisma migrate deploy --schema ./prisma-auth-database/schema.prisma && npx prisma migrate deploy --schema ./prisma-bills-database/schema.prisma
scripts.studio: npx prisma studio --schema ./prisma-auth-database/schema.prisma --port 5555 & npx prisma studio --schema ./prisma-bills-database/schema.prisma --port 5556
